name: Turn Based Battle Prototype
description:
Controls: Use the on-screen buttons.

General Note: These are graphics are for prototyping purposes only and will NOT be used in my upcoming RPG. You can find the tutorial series used to create the foundation for this prototype here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbsvRhEyGkKcF6TDBhEqYA6cCOjFpV0YM

Gameplay Notes:

  • The enemy element type is randomized at the start of each battle and is indicated by a coloured outline (green=wood, red=fire, brown=earth, white=metal, blue=water)
  • Use the right elemental attacks and skills to deal extra damage to the enemy
  • The player and the enemy both regain a small amount of SP at the start of each turn
  • If a skill is used that requires more SP than what's available, some HP will be consumed instead
  • The faster you input your commands, the higher chance you'll be able to have multiple turns in a row
